name: Darumaka Catcher
description:
v0.1Update

- Release!!

- Its in Early-Access, so feel free to help bugtest, suggest stuff :)

Darucatcher is a game inspired by the "Safari Zone" in Gen III Pokemon. e.g. Firered and Leafgreen etc.

Art Credits:

Darumaka Asset is drawn by me(sireoh).
